testcase.name: Successful Login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User launch Chrome Browser............................................passed When User opens URL "http://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"...............passed And User enters username: "admin@yourstore.com".............................passed And User enters Password: "admin"...........................................passed And Click on login..........................................................passed Then Page titile should be "Dashboard / nopCommerce administration".........passed And User click on Logout link...............................................passed And close chrome browser....................................................passed
